column5: Well there it is my first fish of 2008. Not much of a fish but hey it is the first one. post some of your opener fish for 2008!
My first fish of 08 out of season tho so took a quick pic and put him back second he touched water he went like lightning
Here's mine. Caught on Saturday with a bluefox spinner #4.
haha Mike caught the bait for Pures fish! haha good job boys!
Congrats on your first fish of the year....it beat my first fish...same species, but you're was bigger....LOL.
Cliff that pic make me howl everytime I see it!! you look like a munchkin!  Were off to see the wizard...  G
LOL I once had an auntie Em myself.BOO HOO.
Hey now....munchkins are people too....LOL.  That was a huge fish man...you know what they say...the camera adds about 100 pounds....or was that 10.....
Ice Fishing Opener     Steelies (not opener, but first time out this year)  First one of 08    Pike Opener
Steve Nice whitie! ( love the Quebec breakfast too!)
Nice Musky, again a OOS fish but still nice.
Oh.. mu .....god,  I'm.....dyin'  Laughing .....hurts........too.. much.........   HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
